YODER'S SANDWICH SHOPPE
1201 Sunset Avenue Perry, Georgia
Open Monday - Friday 11:00 am - 3:30 pm.
478-987-2428
Roast beef panini at Yoder's Sandwich Shoppe (January 04, 2011)
Grilled ham and cheese sandwich with potato chips (September 21, 2010)
If you traveling on I-75 and want to have sandwiches for lunch, Yoder's Sandwich Shoppe is a good choice. It has a nice selection of sandwiches including pimento cheese, BLTs, panini, Cubans, etc. A sign inside gives notice that this is not a fast food restaurant, so you can expect a short wait while your sandwich is prepared. This is good because Yoder's Sandwich Shoppe will custom-make your sandwich as you wish.
Soup and salads are also available. A kid's menu features grilled cheese, PB&J, and hot dogs. Good homemade desserts include cookies, cake, and cupcakes. Most of the desserts are sitting on the counter in plastic containers near the cash register, so it is easy to pick up one of the way out to eat later
Directions: Yoder's Sandwich Shoppe is in the Perry Plaza on U.S. Highway 41 just a short distance north of downtown Perry ( i.e. only about 1/4 mile from Main St.).
This page last updated on July 17, 2011
